instance_template:
loc("Station1"; "Junction1"; "Junction2"; "SubstationA"; "SubstationB").
edge("Station1", "Junction1"). edge("Junction1", "Station1").
edge("Station1", "Junction2"). edge("Junction2", "Station1").
edge("Junction1", "SubstationA"). edge("SubstationA", "Junction1").
edge("Junction2", "SubstationB"). edge("SubstationB", "Junction2").
edge("Junction1", "Junction2"). edge("Junction2", "Junction1").
target("SubstationA"; "SubstationB").
energy_limit(8).
generator:
energy(0..L) :- energy_limit(L).
1 { visit(Loc, P) : loc(Loc) } 1 :- energy(P).
visit("Station1", 0).
{ inspect_at(Target, P) : energy(P), P < 8 } :- target(Target).

hard_constraints.description: Spatial transitions between non-adjacent locations are prohibited; a move between distinct facilities at consecutive energy increments is only valid if a direct edge connection exists.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- visit(L1, P), visit(L2, P+1), L1 != L2, not edge(L1, L2).

hard_constraints.description: Each designated facility in the inspection set must be inspected at least once within the operational energy budget.
An inspection action requires the agent to be physically present at the target location for the duration of the energy expenditure, spanning from the start of the action to its completion.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
:- inspect_at(L, P), visit(L, P) != L.
:- inspect_at(L, P), visit(L, P+1) != L.

hard_constraints.description: To prevent signal interference, the traversal of Junction1 is strictly forbidden at any temporal point that occurs after a visit to Junction2 but before the initiation of an inspection at SubstationA.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- visit("Junction2", P1), inspect_at("SubstationA", P2), visit("Junction1", P3), P1 < P3, P3 < P2.

soft_constraints.description: Preference is given to routes that minimize the cumulative energy consumption recorded at the point of completing the final required inspection.
soft_constraints.asp_rule:
completion_power(P) :- P = #max{ T+1 : inspect_at(L, T) }.
penalty("energy_efficiency", "total", P) :- completion_power(P).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Tag, Tuple : penalty(Tag, Tuple, Cost) }.
